thread.title: BRIEF-UK'S CMA Investigating Acquisition Of Ebiquity's Advertising Intelligence Unit By Nielsen

title: BRIEF-UK'S CMA Investigating Acquisition Of Ebiquity's Advertising Intelligence Unit By Nielsen

organizations.name: brief-uk's cma investigating acquisition of ebiquity

text:
36 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-UK'S CMA Investigating Acquisition Of Ebiquity's Advertising Intelligence Unit By Nielsen Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
  UKâ€™S CMA - 
* INVESTIGATING PROPOSED ACQUISITION BY NIELSEN COMPANY (US) LLC OF THE ADVERTISING INTELLIGENCE DIVISION OF EBIQUITY PLC. 
* CONSIDERING WHETHER NIELSEN-EBIQUITY DEAL WILL RESULT IN CREATION OF RELEVANT MERGER SITUATION UNDER MERGER PROVISIONS OF ENTERPRISE ACT 2002 
* CONSIDERING WHETHER NIELSEN-EBIQUITY DEAL MAY RESULT IN SUBSTANTIAL LESSENING OF COMPETITION WITHIN ANY MARKET OR MARKETS IN THE UK Source text ( bit.ly/2IV3UVC ) Further company coverage:
